ModuleDescription: This course offers an advanced level, seminar based learning experience in Urban Studies. Topical coverage will vary depending from semester to semester, depending on the faculty delivering the course. As an advanced level course in the Urban Studies program the seminar will offer a depth dive into a specialist topic and/or offer advanced level exposure to and use of relevant techniques.
Prerequisite: YSS2220 Introduction to Urban Studies and YSS3222 Urban Theory or with the permission of the instructor.
